definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Inorganic chemistry teaching reform and practice is reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了無機化學的教學改革與實踐。

sentences.english: Simulation is the most important method in the study of bioinorganic chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 模擬法是生物無機化學的重要研究方法。

sentences.english: The fundamentals of inorganic chemistry are very important.
sentences.chinese: 無機化學的基礎很重要。

sentences.english: He is now an MPhil candidate at HKUST, studying bio- inorganic chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 他現在科大念生物無機化學哲學碩士課程。
